Course Name: ACG 4252 - INTERNATIONAL FINANCIAL REPORTING STANDARDS I (IFRS)
Course Description: THIS COURSE PROVIDES AN OVERVIEW OF INTERNATIONAL FINANCIAL REPORTING STANDARDS (IFRS) INCLUDING FINANCIAL REPORTING STANDARDS, CONCEPTUAL FRAMEWORK, THE IASB STRUCTURE, AND VARIOUS FINANCIAL DATA. ETHICAL CONDUCT AS IT RELATES TO INTERNATIONAL ACCOUNTING CONCEPTS IS ALSO COVERED.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
